content: Important: The devices that are listed are in bold italics to indicate that you must replace the example values with the values from your planning worksheet for your site. This convention is used throughout this book. Important: It is imperative that the INSTALL EXEC succeeds. If it fails, do not proceed. You must fix the issues and try again. 128 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 5.6.2 IPL the new z/VM 7.2 IPL your initial z/VM 7.2 system from DASD. Your 3270 Integrated Console session is still running. Perform the following steps to IPL: 1. In the HMC, the LPAR of the first VMSSI member must still be selected. Click Tasks in the upper right; then, click Recovery → Load. 2. The Load window opens. Complete the following steps: a. Set the Load Address to the new system residence volume, which is 155C in this example. b. Set the Load Parameter to SYSG, which specifies to use the Integrated 3270 Console. c. Click OK. 3. When you see the Load Task Confirmation window, click
